title.rendered: Join Me for Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey 12/16/16

content.rendered:
Salesforce Automation Hour is a Webinar series to demonstrate all levels of declarative Automation inside Salesforce.

  • Webinar Name: Salesforce Automation Hour -12/16/2016
  • Time: 12pm PST (3pm EST)
  • Presenter: Meighan Brodkey
  • Webinar Registration Link: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8207021249714603267

Find the webinar resources here.

Make sure you join us on the Success Community!

excerpt.rendered: Salesforce Automation Hour is a Webinar series to demonstrate all levels of declarative Automation inside Salesforce.

@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Us For Automation Hour, a New Webinar Series!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you are a Salesforce Admin, Developer, Analyst, Architect, or anyone else that does automation of anything in Salesforce, the new Salesforce Automation Hour is for you!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2021
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce 2021 events calendar with Community run Dreamin events, bootcamps, Salesforce run events, and more

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Me When I Present at the World Tour Chicago
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join me in Chicago 6/15 3 pm, when I present at the Salesforce World Tour on Communities!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seattle WIT User Group June Event
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join the amazing Salesforce women of Seattle to talk about the Summer '16 release, your favorite ideas to vote for, and the ideas you have to increase Salesforce usability.   Everyone is welcome Admins, End Users, Developers, Stakeholders, and anyone else that uses Salesforce in one way or another.  The…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seattle WIT User Group May 13th Happy Hour
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Are you a Salesforce woman in technology or a supporter of Salesforce women in technology? Are you located in the Greater Seattle area?  If you answered yes to both of the questions above, you should register for the Seattle Women in Tech User group Happy Hour on Friday, May 13th…

jetpack-related-posts.title: These Women Love Salesforce — and Have Tattoos to Prove It
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: In 2017 my Ohana, Lauren Dunn, was visiting Seattle from Ireland, and what else would we do besides get Salesforce Tattoos!
